trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived form, provides functionality for loggers that handle events raised by the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i et avledet skjema, inneholder funksjonalitet for tastetrykkregistratorer som håndterer hendelser oppstå i [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] motoren.

trans-unit.source: This abstract class provides default implementations for the methods and properties of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger> interface.
trans-unit.target: Denne abstrakte klassen leverer standard implementering for metodene og egenskapene for den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger>grensesnittet.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger>

trans-unit.source: This class can only be instantiated in a derived form.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan bare opprettes i et avledet skjema.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Logger"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Logger"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Generates an error message that is in the default format, from a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Genererer en feilmelding som standard-format fra en <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The arguments of the error event.
trans-unit.target: Argumenter for feil-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents an error message in canonical format.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som representerer en feilmelding i godkjent format.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Generates a warning message that is in the default format, from a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Genererer en advarsel som finnes i standard-format fra en <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The arguments of the warning event.
trans-unit.target: Argumenter for advarsel-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents a warning message in canonical format.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som representerer en advarsel i godkjent format.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, subscribes the logger to specific events.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, abonnerer du logger på bestemte hendelser.

trans-unit.source: This method must be overridden in the derived class to perform initialization logic and to subscribe to build events published by <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden må overstyres i den utledede klassen å utføre initialisering logic og abonnere for å opprette hendelser som er publisert av <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource>

trans-unit.source: The available events that a logger can subscribe to.
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengelige hendelsene som en transaksjonslogging kan abonnere på.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Logger.Verbosity*> setting is at least the value that is passed in.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den gjeldende <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Logger.Verbosity*>innstillingen er minst verdien som er sendt inn</xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Logger.Verbosity*>

trans-unit.source: The logger verbosity setting passed in.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingen transaksjonslogging detaljnivået sendt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current logger verbosity setting is at least the value that is passed in; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis gjeldende transaksjonslogging detaljnivået er minst verdien som er sendt inn. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined parameters of the logger.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en brukerdefinert parameterne for transaksjonslogging.

trans-unit.source: If the derived class does not take parameters, then it can ignore this property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den utledede klassen ikke ta parametere, kan det ignorere denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The logger parameters.
trans-unit.target: Parameterne for meldingslogging.

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, releases the resources allocated to the logger at the time of initialization or during the build.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, frigir ressursene som er tildelt til loggen da initialisering eller under byggingen.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden in the derived class to perform shutdown logic, such as releasing acquired resources.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan overstyres i den utledede klassen til å utføre avsluttet logic, for eksempel frigivelse hentet ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level of detail to show in the event log.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir detaljnivået skal vises i hendelsesloggen.

trans-unit.source: While a logger is free to choose the events it logs, following the verbosity guidelines creates a consistent user experience.
trans-unit.target: En logger er fri til å velge hendelser logger den, oppretter følge detaljnivået retningslinjene en konsekvent brukeropplevelse.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"> </xref>.
